name: AI Fundamentals MCQs - LLM Levers
description: Multiple choice questions for AI fundamentals - LLM Levers
audience: Students of the AI DOJO AI Fundamentals course
:LABEL: Curriculum

name: Multiple choice questions - Controlling randomness
understandingCriteria:string[]: The student needs to be able to answer correctly: QUESTION 1: Increasing the temperature of LLM output tokens: A) Increases model aggressiveness B) Reduces hallucination outputs C) Limits the vocabulary of outputs D) Increases randomness of outputs. Correct answer is D.;The student needs to be able to answer correctly: QUESTION 2: Adjusting the temperature affects LLM outputs by: A) Flattening the spread of probabilities of possible next tokens B) Selecting the top T (temperature) tokens only C) Normalizing logits so that the sum of them equals 1 D) Keeping only the most likely tokens with a cumulative sum of temperature (T);The student needs to be able to answer correctly: QUESTION 3: Top K selects for the most likely tokens, effectively reducing vocabulary. What is a risk of setting top K too low? A) Looping and repetitive outputs B) Random and unpredictable outputs C) Highly accurate outputs D) Grammatical errors;The student needs to be able to answer correctly: QUESTION 4: An LLM agent keeps hallucinating. Which of the following strategies could mitigate this? A) Increase top K B) Increase temperature C) Reduce the output tokens D) Reduce top p;The student needs to be able to answer correctly: QUESTION 5: Which of the following would make LLM outputs more creative for generating marketing material? A) Temperature 0.2, low top K B) Temperature 0.1, high top K, C) Temperature 1.4, high top p D) Temperature 2.0, high top p;The student needs to be able to answer correctly: QUESTION 6: Which of the following would make LLM outputs more useful for drafting client meeting notes? A) Temperature 0.2, low top p B) Temperature 0.2, high top K, C) Temperature 1.4, high top p D) Temperature 1.4, low top p
